mapper.select: select db_order, SHOPNAME, SENDERCITY, SENDERCOUNTRY, SENDERCOUNTY, SENDERNAME, SENDERPHONE, SENDERPOSTCODE, SENDERPROVINCE, SENDERSTREETADDRESS, PICKUPCITY, PICKUPCOUNTY, PICKUPCOUNTRY, PICKUPPHONE, PICKUPNAME, PICKUPPOSTCODE, PICKUPPROVINCE, PICKUPSTREETADDRESS, OPER, OPERTIME from db_aliaddress where db_order = #{dbOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select db_order, SHOPNAME, SENDERCITY, SENDERCOUNTRY, SENDERCOUNTY, SENDERNAME, SENDERPHONE, SENDERPOSTCODE, SENDERPROVINCE, SENDERSTREETADDRESS, PICKUPCITY, PICKUPCOUNTY, PICKUPCOUNTRY, PICKUPPHONE, PICKUPNAME, PICKUPPOSTCODE, PICKUPPROVINCE, PICKUPSTREETADDRESS, OPER, OPERTIME from db_aliaddress
mapper.sql: DB_ORDER , SHOPNAME , SENDERCITY , SENDERCOUNTRY , SENDERCOUNTY , SENDERNAME , SENDERPHONE , SENDERPOSTCODE , SENDERPROVINCE , SENDERSTREETADDRESS , PICKUPCITY , PICKUPCOUNTY , PICKUPCOUNTRY , PICKUPPHONE , PICKUPNAME , PICKUPPOSTCODE , PICKUPPROVINCE , PICKUPSTREETADDRESS , OPER , OPERTIME

DB_ORDER = #{db_order,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERCITY = #{sendercity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERCOUNTRY = #{sendercountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERCOUNTY = #{sendercounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERNAME = #{sendername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERPHONE = #{senderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERPOSTCODE = #{senderpostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERPROVINCE = #{senderprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERSTREETADDRESS = #{senderstreetaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPCITY = #{pickupcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPCOUNTY = #{pickupcounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPCOUNTRY = #{pickupcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPPHONE = #{pickupphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPNAME = #{pickupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPPOSTCODE = #{pickuppostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPPROVINCE = #{pickupprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PICKUPSTREETADDRESS = #{pickupstreetaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=CHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and 1=1

DB_ORDER = #{db_order,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SENDERCITY = #{sendercity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SENDERCOUNTRY = #{sendercountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

PICKUPCITY = #{pickupcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PICKUPCOUNTY = #{pickupcounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PICKUPCOUNTRY = #{pickupcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PICKUPPHONE = #{pickupphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PICKUPNAME = #{pickupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PICKUPPOSTCODE = #{pickuppostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PICKUPPROVINCE = #{pickupprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

, 1=1
